title: Reaver Shark
toolpower:
[img:Pickaxe mask] 59% (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
100% (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
summaries: The Reaver Shark is a pickaxe available through fishing in the Ocean.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it can mine <linked>Demonite</linked> and <linked>Crimtane Ore</linked>, and <linked>Obsidian</linked>.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked> and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked> versions, it can mine <linked>Hellstone</linked>, which would otherwise require fighting the <linked>Eater of Worlds</linked> or <linked>Brain of Cthulhu</linked> to craft the <linked>Nightmare</linked> or <linked>Deathbringer Pickaxe</linked>.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Tool speed: 13 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 18 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 1 GC50 SC
